DOC.brief_title: Dry Needling Patients With Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective single-blind randomize controlled trial , design assess efficacy dry needling treatment chronic neck pain . The treatment regimes simulate standard physiotherapy administer real clinical setting . Patients intervention group receive combination manual therapy dry needling ( 40mmx0,32 guide needle ) . There two control group . In first one , patient receive combination manual therapy sham dry needling . In second control group , patient receive treatment order assess natural history disease . Patients receive two treatment session interval 7 day follow 30 day . The primary outcome subjective pain assess Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) . Secondary outcome pressure pain threshold ( assessed manual algometer ) , neck range motion ( assessed goniometer ) Neck Disability Index ( standardize questionnaire ) . Measurements take pre post-test first second treatment session , plus follow-up , except Neck Disability Index ( begin second treatment ) . In non-treated group , patient measure time interval . The sample size calculate detect VAS difference 2 point , minimally clinically important difference establish literature . Then double order avoid possible dropout . The trial take place private practice Madrid ( Physios , c/Valverde 26 ) . Patients randomized computer program . Patients explore active trigger point upper trapezius levator scapula . They meet criteria identification establish Travell & Simons Trigger point manual . The investigator also seek trigger point follow Travell & Simons ' pain map two muscle , identify five trigger point area . The investigator select active , taking pressure pain threshold measurement active trigger point , normalize value accord normal threshold five area two muscle . The normal threshold assess pilot study healthy patient . The investigator administer either dry sham dry needle active ( one low pain threshold ) throughout trial . Dry needle apply follow Hong 's technique 40mmx0,32 guide needle , physiotherapist 4 year experience technique .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Neck pain least three month ( ) An active trigger point either upper trapezius levator scapula Exclusion criterion Treatment neck pain within previous six month Neck Whiplash Fibromyalgia Infection area treatment Pharmacological treatment anticoagulant Fear needle Degenerative condition Pregnancy
